title: 'Non sticking'
body: A 3rd rated product. Completely false claims. Does not stick for long on outdoor surfaces. Doubtful whether it's a Pidilite product. It cannot be returned now, I am willing to return at half my cost. Will never recommend.

title: 'Pidilite Steelgrip Multi Purpose Duct Tape'
column5: waterproof and easy to handle / paste. It stays in place even in very high temperatures and also during heavy rains. Very satisfied with this duct tape. Strongly recommended.'
